divs: sighting details3 children&i were playing hide & seek when i noticed lights shooting from one star to another,we watched for 20 mins in amasement.lights were all over the night sky doing odd things that were so far away.i had to tell my mom who was in the house and so did the kids from next store. my mom was resting and when i told her what i was seeing she just told me to go away i am resting.it took 15 mins of pleating with her befor she got up and came outside.now when everyone was outside nieghbors included,ipointed in the direction of the strange lights but nothing was happening.as we looked around the sky we saw nothing.all i remember is all of us looked back were i frist saw the shooting lights and every thing went black our front porch lights the street light,when i turned around i saw a huge disk shaped object 6 or 7 storys high and as big as a football feild with no noise.it had different colored lights in the middle changing every few seconds....this thing came out of nowhere because i just looked in that direction no less than 1\2 second ago!...as we watched the ufo in darkness it slowly followed the hwy rt 62 in northcollins ny.go along the road at the same speed about 5 mph.soon it went over tall trees a1\2 mile away and it was gone.soon after the street light came on and did our front lights. my mother went in the house and called the police.it took the police about 45 mins to arrive and take statements.now as we are all there we see from the southwest 3 bright lightscomming at us fast with a lot of noise. as it got closer it flew directly over our heads it was so low,as low as the ufo we saw earlier, on the bottom of the aircraft were the letters u s a f in black lettering. the cop and the rest of us dident know what to make of it.i have told this story to my friends who say ya ok what were you smoking i was a 13 yr old country boy at the time for gods sake. some of the wittness are no longer with us but there are 4 or 5 still out there and saw exactly what i told you. iam not making this up,i have been waiting years to tell my story to a credible organization all i can say is this was not from this world,and feel honored to see something that big float above my head god bless yours truly stephen rice.
Summary: playing hide& seek with children next store,I noticed a light shoot from one star to another.so we all stoped and watched this strange event!
